```{r}
library(psrc.travelsurvey)

vars <- c("deliver_elsewhere", "deliver_food", "deliver_grocery", "deliver_none", 
          "deliver_office", "deliver_package",
          "hhincome_broad", "home_county", "vehicle_count",
          "age","transit_freq","race_category")

# Retrieve the data
hts_data <- get_psrc_hts(survey_vars = vars) 
variable_list <- psrc.travelsurvey:::init_variable_list
rs3 <- psrc_hts_stat(hts_data, "day", c("survey_year","deliver_none"), incl_na=FALSE)
```
